title: Why wasn’t Cuba able to lay the foundations for long-term stability and prosperity during its first three decades of independence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cuba in 1902 was not ready to govern itself. The Island was ruined by thirty years of intermittent warfare and the best men were dead. This resulted in a series of corrupt and dictatorial governments, coups and political crimes that ended in a Castro-Comunist Revolution that ruined what little had been achieved until then.
